definition: tree trunk/main part of sth/to manage/to work/to do/capable/cadre/to kill (slang)/to fuck (vulgar)
tree trunk/main part of sth/to manage/to work/to do/capable/cadre/to kill (slang)/to fuck (vulgar)
a certain number or amount/how many?/how much?
diaphysis (long segment of a bone)/fig. backbone
what are you doing?/what's he up to?
to dry (of weather, paint, cement etc)/desiccation/dull/uninteresting/arid

sentences.english: Not very much. You are a turnkey at the Conciergerie?
sentences.chinese: 要你干的并不太多。你在附属监狱管牢房么？

sentences.english: I am tired of hunting the same old coon.
sentences.chinese: 反复干同样的事，我真干腻了。

sentences.english: Pablo must have a sound plan or he would not have tried it.
sentences.chinese: 巴勃罗一定有个行得通的方案，否则他不会这么干。

sentences.english: The ground is covered with stiff, dry branches which have rotted off as the trees die.
sentences.chinese: 地上全是硬而干的树枝，都是因树死而凋落下来的。

sentences.english: We want someone for the job who has lots of pizzazz .
sentences.chinese: 我们想要有生气的人干这项工作。

sentences.english: When I was doing the housework, my husband telephoned me from the office.
sentences.chinese: 当我正在干家务时，我丈夫从办公室打电话给我。

sentences.english: Only humping yourself can you hope to finish your work in time.
sentences.chinese: 只有加把劲干，你才有希望按时完成任务。

sentences.english: Global warming caused a dryer and warmer climate in the centeral part of Qinghai-Tibet plateau.
sentences.chinese: 受全球变暖影响，青藏高原气候呈现出暖干趋势。

sentences.english: He went about the job like a bull in a china shop.
sentences.chinese: 他干这种活就想公牛进了瓷器店那样莽撞。

sentences.english: Tell me, Monsieur Thenardier, is what we have done permissible?
sentences.chinese: 我们干的这种事，德纳第先生，你说说，是允许的吗？

sentences.english: In the end, the workers became used to doing hard work.
sentences.chinese: 最后，工人们终于习惯于干苦活了。

sentences.english: Dried rhizome of rehmannia and other herbs are also added.
sentences.chinese: 同时也会加一些干地黄和其他的草药。

sentences.english: They were given nothing other than dry bread and water for their evening meal.
sentences.chinese: 他们只得到了干面包和水作晚餐。

sentences.english: Sub-cellar housing the ancient halls are dry and wet courtyard patio.
sentences.chinese: 古窨子屋堂内有干天井和湿天井。

sentences.english: It was a very interesting project. I really enjoyed working on it.
sentences.chinese: 这个项目很有意思，我很喜欢干。

sentences.english: It will not infect or colonize dead or dried plant tissue.
sentences.chinese: 它不会传染或寄居于死的或干的植体组织。

definition: erhua variant of 幹活|干活[gan4 huo2]

to do/to make/to produce/to write/to compose/to act as/to engage in/to hold (a party)/to be/to become/to function (in some capacity)/to serve as/to be used for/to form (a bond or relationship)/to pretend/to feign/to act a part/to put on appearance
variant of 人[ren2]/"person" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 10), occurring in 兒, 兀, 兄 etc
dialectal equivalent of 什麼|什么[shen2 me5]/also pr. [sha4]
erhua variant of 苦活[ku3 huo2]
to cook on a slow fire/to extract by heating/to decoct/to endure
to mix/to mingle/muddled/to drift along/to muddle along/to pass for/to get along with sb/thoughtless/reckless
to struggle to get free/to strive to acquire/to make (money)
